mapper.select: SELECT notice_no as noticeNo, id, enroll_dt as enrollDt, modify_dt as modifyDt, title, contents, hit FROM notice ORDER BY notice_no desc
SELECT notice_no as noticeNo, id, enroll_dt as enrollDt, modify_dt as modifyDt, title, contents, hit FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, modify_dt=#{modifyDt} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
UPDATE notice SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
